column1: Table 4-83:  SF6 Emission Factors (kg SF6 per metric ton of magnesium)

column2: a Weighted average includes all die casters, Partners and non-Partners.  For the majority of the time series (2000-2007), Partners made up 100 percent of die casters in the United States.
b Weighted average that includes an estimated emission factor of 5.2 kg SF6 per metric ton of magnesium for die casters that do not participate in the Partnership.
